input.sentences: i like to photograph old buildings in my spare time .
i like the way they are designed .
some of them are very very old .
they catch my eye from far away .
output.sentences: In my spare time I like to take pictures of old buildings.
I like thinking about who designed them, and what they were thinking when they did.
The sheer size of some of the buildings is breathtaking.
In order to get the full scope of the building, I take many pictures from different distances.
The more eye catching building is, the more I feel the need to photograph it.
